content.rendered:
Directed by Diya Annapurna Ghosh

Written by Tania Bhattacharya. Sujoy Ghosh. Raj Vasant

Star Abhishek Bachchan (Bob Biswas). Chitrangda Singh (Mary Biswas). Paran Banerjee (Kali Da). Kaushik Chakraborty (Ustaad). Tina Desai (Indira Verma). Samara Tijori (Mini). Bhanu Uday (Jishu Narang). Vishwanath Chatterjee (Kharaj Sahu). Pabitra Rabha (Dhonu). Rajatabha Dutta (Shekhar Chatterjee). Purab Kohli (Bubai). Yusuf Hussain (Bob’s Doctor). Ditipriya Roy (Tina). Barun Chanda (Father Rufus)

Language Hindi

Producers Saubhik Das. Sujoy Ghosh. Bonnie Jain. Gauri Khan. Lovekush Kumar. Dharmic Mathur. Dharam Soni. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Gaurav Verma

Production Boundscript Motion Pictures. Red Chillies Entertainment
